item.title: Example Event
item.description:
Slides can be added in a few ways:

  • Create slides using Wowchemy’s Slides feature and link using slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file
  • Upload an existing slide deck to static/ and link using url_slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file
  • Embed your slides (e.g. Google Slides) or presentation video on this page using shortcodes.

Further event details, including page elements such as image galleries, can be added to the body of this page.

Jian Yang and Monica Hall Win the Best Paper Award at Wowchemy 2020
item.description:
Congratulations to Jian Yang and Monica Hall for winning the Best Paper Award at the 2020 Conference on Wowchemy for their paper ‚ÄúLearning Wowchemy‚Äù.

News
item.description:
[Nov 2025] Welcome Prof. Li Zhou to our team as a Visiting Professor!

[Nov 2025] Welcome Yu Lei to our team as a Visiting PhD student!

[Nov 2025] One paper has been accepted by AAAI 2026 Main Technical Track, and one paper has been accepted by the Student Abstract and Poster Program. Congratulations to all co-authors!

[Oct 2025] I was invited to give a talk on trustworthy generative recommender systems for social connections at Ola Chat

[Oct 2025] Welcome Mao Li to our team as a Visiting PhD student!

[Oct 2025] Welcome Huizhong Guo to our team as a Visiting PhD student!

[Oct 2025] I was invited to give a talk on generative models for recommendation at Lorong AI, Singapore!

[Sep 2025] I was invited to give a talk on generative models for recommendation at the Infocomm Media Development Authority (IMDA), Singapore!

[Sep 2025] Welcome Zihang Luo to our team as a PhD student!

[Sep 2025] One paper was accepted by IEEE TEVC 2025. Congratulations to all co-authors!

[Sep 2025] Welcome Zhuoxuan Huang to our team as a Visiting PhD student!

[Aug 2025] I was invited to give a talk on generative recommendation at Huawei Hong Kong Research Center (HKRC)!

[Aug 2025] I was invited to give a talk on generative recommendation at the Department of Computer Science, Hong Kong Baptist University (HKBU)!

[Aug 2025] Welcome Lingfeng Huang to our team as a Research Assistant!

[Aug 2025] I have been appointed as the Undergraduate Consortium Co-Chair of AAAI 2026!

[May 2025] One paper was accepted by KDD 2025

[May 2025] One paper was accepted by ACM TOIS 2025

[Apr 2025] I was awarded the 2025 TL@SUTD Seed Research Project Grant as the PI!

[Apr 2025] I was invited as a mentor for the PhD Symposium at TheWebConf 2025

[Apr 2025] I was invited to give a talk titled “Leveraging LLMs for Recommendation” at the Women in the Web session of TheWebConf 2025

[Apr 2025] I received the Rising Stars of Women in Web Award at TheWebConf, 2025!

[Apr 2025] One paper was accepted by ACM TOIS 2025

[Apr 2025] One paper was accepted by SIGIR 2025

[Mar 2025] One paper was accepted by Neural Networks 2025

[Feb 2025] Our paper “Revisiting Bundle Recommendation for Intent-aware Product Bundling” has been selected as ACM TORS 2024 Featured Article!

[Feb 2025] I was invited to join the Editorial Board of Memetic Computing for 2025

[Jan 2025] One paper was accepted by Neural Networks 2025

[Jan 2025] One paper was accepted by TheWebConf 2025 as an oral presentation!

[Jan 2025] One paper was accepted by ACM TOIS, 2025

[Dec 2024] My PhD Student Sun Yatong at MQ was awarded the Vice-Chancellor’s Commendation for his PhD Thesis - Congratulations üéâüéâüéâ!

[Dec 2024] I was awarded the 2024 SUTD Kickstarter Initiative (SKI) Grant as the PI!

[Dec 2024] Three research papers were accepted by AAAI, 2025

[Dec 2024] One paper was accepted by IJHCI, 2024

[Nov 2024] One paper was accepted by ACM TIST, 2024

[Oct 2024] I received the Outstanding Reviewer Award at ACM RecSys, 2024

[Jul 2024] One paper was accepted by ACM RecSys, 2024

[Jul 2024] We received a Best Paper Nomination at SIGIR, 2024

[May 2024] Two research papers were accepted by KDD, 2024

[Mar 2024] Four research papers were accepted by SIGIR, 2024
